summary: Recolored FEMALE Forsworn, Leather, and Daedric items.
descriptionHtml:
This is some basic recoloring I did for my Character\'s current gear. I have beaten most of the game therefore I am perfectly willing to wear any gear that I think looks good, since I can just uber upgrade it anyway with console commands. It is all a black base with white trim. The specific outfit I actually use is based around the Female Forsworn Armor, but uses other non-Forsworn pieces to supplement it.

Items that will be affected:

Forsworn Armor
Forsworn Boots
Forsworn Hands
Forsworn Bow
Forsworn Arrows

Leather Helm
Leather Armor
Leather Boots
Leather Hands

Daedric Bow
Daedric Arrows
Daedric 1h Sword

Silver based Rings & Necklaces
Copper based Circlets

To install simply use Nexus Mod Manager. Or to manually install get to your ...Steam/Steamapps/Common/Skyrim/Data folder and follow the filepath in this mod from there and install copy/paste desired files in place.
author: Andrew R
